tasks.title: Create Attractor-compatible DOT exporter module
tasks.description: Implement a new export module that transforms ZeroRepo delta reports into Attractor-compatible pipeline DOT graphs with proper node types and shapes
tasks.details: Create `src/zerorepo/graph_construction/attractor_exporter.py` that maps delta classifications to DOT nodes: MODIFIED/NEW → box (codergen), auto-generated hexagon (validation gates), diamond (decision nodes). Include node attributes: worker_type, acceptance, bead_id, prd_ref. Generate start (Mdiamond) and finalize (Msquare) nodes. Implement worker type inference from file paths using pattern matching.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for delta-to-DOT mapping, node attribute generation, worker type inference. Integration test with sample delta report producing valid DOT output.

tasks.title: Extend ZeroRepo export.py with attractor-pipeline format
tasks.description: Modify the existing export module to support --format=attractor-pipeline option that leverages the new attractor exporter
tasks.details: Modify `src/zerorepo/graph_construction/export.py` to add attractor-pipeline format option. Integrate with the new attractor_exporter module. Ensure the export produces valid DOT files that pass `attractor validate`. Include proper edge generation following RPG dependency order.
tasks.testStrategy: Test export format option, validate generated DOT structure, ensure no circular dependencies, verify attractor CLI validation passes.

tasks.title: Update zerorepo-run-pipeline.py with attractor format support
tasks.description: Modify the pipeline runner script to support the new attractor-pipeline export format
tasks.details: Update `.claude/skills/orchestrator-multiagent/scripts/zerorepo-run-pipeline.py` to accept and process --format=attractor-pipeline option. Ensure the script calls the updated export functionality and outputs the DOT file alongside the delta report.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end test running the pipeline script with attractor format, verify DOT file generation, validate output structure.

tasks.title: Create comprehensive unit tests for attractor exporter
tasks.description: Implement thorough unit tests for the new attractor exporter functionality
tasks.details: Create `tests/unit/test_attractor_exporter.py` with test cases for: delta classification mapping, node attribute generation, worker type inference patterns, edge generation, start/finalize node creation, and validation gate pairing logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with mock delta reports, edge case testing for file path patterns, validation of generated DOT syntax and structure.

tasks.title: Create zerorepo-pipeline.sh workflow script
tasks.description: Implement the single-command workflow script that orchestrates the complete definition pipeline from PRD to executable DOT graph
tasks.details: Create `.claude/skills/orchestrator-multiagent/scripts/zerorepo-pipeline.sh` that executes: zerorepo init (if needed), zerorepo generate with PRD spec, export to DOT, attractor validate, attractor annotate, attractor init-promise. Store output at `.claude/attractor/pipelines/<PRD-ID>.dot` and create checkpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end workflow testing with sample PRD, verify each pipeline stage completes, validate checkpoint creation and file placement.

tasks.title: Enhance attractor annotate.py for bead cross-referencing
tasks.description: Modify the attractor annotate script to cross-reference generated DOT nodes with existing beads database
tasks.details: Update `.claude/scripts/attractor/annotate.py` to match DOT node attributes with beads database entries, populate bead_id attributes where matches exist, and handle cases where no matching beads are found.
tasks.testStrategy: Test annotation with existing beads database, verify bead_id population, test handling of unmatched nodes.

tasks.title: Enhance attractor init-promise.py for completion promise creation
tasks.description: Modify the init-promise script to create completion promises from generated DOT graphs with acceptance criteria per validation gate
tasks.details: Update `.claude/scripts/attractor/init_promise.py` to parse hexagon validation gates from DOT graphs, extract acceptance criteria from node attributes, and create completion promises with one AC per hexagon node.
tasks.testStrategy: Test promise creation from DOT graphs, verify acceptance criteria extraction, validate promise structure and completeness.

tasks.title: Update ZEROREPO.md documentation with new workflow
tasks.description: Document the new zerorepo-pipeline workflow and attractor integration in the orchestrator documentation
tasks.details: Update `.claude/skills/orchestrator-multiagent/ZEROREPO.md` to include documentation for the new zerorepo-pipeline.sh workflow, attractor format export, and integration points with the DOT lifecycle.
tasks.testStrategy: Documentation review, ensure examples are accurate and workflow steps are clear.

tasks.title: Update System 3 DOT Navigation section

tasks.details: Update `.claude/output-styles/system3-meta-orchestrator.md` DOT Navigation section to reference ZeroRepo-generated pipelines, include automatic pipeline reading from `.claude/attractor/pipelines/<INITIATIVE>.dot`, and document the integration workflow.

tasks.title: Enhance attractor status.py with dependency filtering
tasks.description: Add --deps-met filter to attractor status command to identify dispatchable nodes
tasks.details: Modify `.claude/scripts/attractor/status.py` to add `--deps-met` filter that identifies nodes with pending status where all upstream dependencies are validated. Implement dependency graph traversal to check upstream completion status.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dependency filtering logic, verify only truly dispatchable nodes are returned, test with complex dependency graphs.

tasks.title: Update System 3 orchestrator spawn workflow
tasks.description: Modify the System 3 orchestrator skill to inject DOT node attributes into spawned orchestrator prompts
tasks.details: Update `.claude/skills/system3-orchestrator/SKILL.md` spawn workflow to inject node's acceptance criteria, worker_type, file paths from RPG enrichment, and prd_ref into orchestrator mission briefs. Implement automatic transition to impl_complete upon orchestrator completion.
tasks.testStrategy: Test orchestrator spawn with DOT node attributes, verify mission brief injection, test automatic state transitions.

tasks.title: Enhance attractor transition.py with validation gate activation
tasks.description: Modify the transition script to handle validation gate activation when codergen nodes reach impl_complete
tasks.details: Update `.claude/scripts/attractor/transition.py` to automatically activate paired hexagon nodes when codergen nodes transition to impl_complete, implement decision diamond routing logic for pass/fail scenarios, and handle retry transitions back to active state.
tasks.testStrategy: Test validation gate activation logic, verify decision routing, test retry scenarios and state transitions.
